00025 #define OFSMODE std::ios::out | std::ios::app | std::ios::ate

00027 XRawStream::XRawStream(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &driverlist)
00028     : XNode(name, runtime),
00029       m_drivers(driverlist),
00030       m_pGFD(0),
00031       m_filename(create<XStringNode>("Filename", true))
00032 {
00033 }
00034 XRawStream::~XRawStream()
00035 {
00036     if(m_pGFD) gzclose(m_pGFD);
00037 }

00039 XRawStreamRecorder::XRawStreamRecorder(const char *name, bool runtime, const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &driverlist)
00040     : XRawStream(name, runtime, driverlist),
00041       m_recording(create<XBoolNode>("Recording", true))
00042 {
00043     recording()->value(false);
00044     
00045     m_lsnOnOpen = filename()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00046         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecorder::onOpen);
00047     m_lsnOnFlush = recording()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00048         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecorder::onFlush);
00049     m_lsnOnCatch = m_drivers->onCatch().connectWeak(
00050         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecorder::onCatch);
00051     m_lsnOnRelease = m_drivers->onRelease().connectWeak(
00052         shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecorder::onRelease);
00053 }
00054 void
00055 XRawStreamRecorder::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00056 {
00057     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(node);
00058     if(m_lsnOnRecord)
00059         driver->onRecord().connect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00060     else
00061         m_lsnOnRecord = driver->onRecord().connectWeak(
00062             shared_from_this(), &XRawStreamRecorder::onRecord);
00063 }
00064 void
00065 XRawStreamRecorder::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00066 {
00067     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(node);
00068     driver->onRecord().disconnect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00069 }
00070 void
00071 XRawStreamRecorder::onOpen(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00072 {
00073     if(m_pGFD) gzclose(m_pGFD);
00074     m_pGFD = gzopen(QString(filename()->to_str()).local8Bit(), "wb");
00075 }
00076 void
00077 XRawStreamRecorder::onFlush(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00078 {
00079     if(!*recording())
00080         if(m_pGFD) {
00081             m_filemutex.lock();    
00082             gzflush(m_pGFD, Z_FULL_FLUSH);
00083             m_filemutex.unlock();    
00084         }
00085 }
00086 void
00087 XRawStreamRecorder::onRecord(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &d)
00088 {
00089     if(*recording() && m_pGFD) {
00090         shared_ptr<XPrimaryDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPrimaryDriver>(d);
00091         if(driver) {
00092             std::vector<char> &rawdata(*XPrimaryDriver::s_tlRawData);
00093             uint32_t size = rawdata.size();
00094             if(size) {
00095                 uint32_t headersize =
00096                     sizeof(uint32_t) //allsize
00097                     + sizeof(int32_t) //time().sec()
00098                     + sizeof(int32_t); //time().usec()            
00099                 std::vector<char> buf;
00100                 // size of raw record wrapped by header and footer
00101                 uint32_t allsize =
00102                     headersize
00103                     + driver->getName().size() //name of driver
00104                     + 2 //two null chars
00105                     + size //rawData
00106                     + sizeof(uint32_t); //allsize
00107                 XPrimaryDriver::push((uint32_t)allsize, buf);
00108                 XPrimaryDriver::push((int32_t)driver->time().sec(), buf);
00109                 XPrimaryDriver::push((int32_t)driver->time().usec(), buf);
00110                 ASSERT(buf.size() == headersize);
00111     
00112                 m_filemutex.lock();
00113                 gzwrite(m_pGFD, &buf[0], buf.size());
00114                 gzprintf(m_pGFD, "%s", (const char*)driver->getName().c_str());
00115                 gzputc(m_pGFD, '\0');
00116                 gzputc(m_pGFD, '\0'); //Reserved
00117                 gzwrite(m_pGFD, &rawdata[0], size);
00118                 buf.clear();
00119                 XPrimaryDriver::push((uint32_t)allsize, buf);
00120                 gzwrite(m_pGFD, &buf[0], buf.size());
00121                 m_filemutex.unlock();
00122             }
00123         }
00124     } 
00125 }

00128 XTextWriter::XTextWriter(const char *name, bool runtime,
00129                          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &driverlist, const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &entrylist)
00130     : XNode(name, runtime),
00131       m_drivers(driverlist),
00132       m_entries(entrylist),
00133       m_filename(create<XStringNode>("Filename", true)),
00134       m_lastLine(create<XStringNode>("LastLine", true)),
00135       m_recording(create<XBoolNode>("Recording", true))
00136 {
00137     recording()->value(false);
00138     lastLine()->setUIEnabled(false);
00139   
00140     m_lsnOnFilenameChanged = filename()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00141         shared_from_this(), &XTextWriter::onFilenameChanged);
00142     m_lsnOnCatch = m_drivers->onCatch().connectWeak(
00143         shared_from_this(), &XTextWriter::onCatch);
00144     m_lsnOnRelease = m_drivers->onRelease().connectWeak(
00145         shared_from_this(), &XTextWriter::onRelease);
00146 }
00147 void
00148 XTextWriter::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00149 {
00150     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(node);
00151     if(m_lsnOnRecord)
00152         driver->onRecord().connect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00153     else
00154         m_lsnOnRecord = driver->onRecord().connectWeak(
00155             shared_from_this(), &XTextWriter::onRecord);
00156 }
00157 void
00158 XTextWriter::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00159 {
00160     shared_ptr<XDriver> driver = dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(node);
00161     driver->onRecord().disconnect(m_lsnOnRecord);
00162 }
00163 void
00164 XTextWriter::onLastLineChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00165     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_filemutex);  
00166     if(m_stream.good())
00167     {
00168         m_stream << lastLine()->to_str()
00169                  << std::endl;
00170     }
00171 }
00172 void
00173 XTextWriter::onRecord(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &driver)
00174 {
00175     if(*recording() == true)
00176     {
00177         if(driver->time())
00178         {
00179             XTime triggered_time;
00180             std::deque<shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> > locked_entries;
00181 
00182             atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_entries->children());
00183             if(list) { 
00184                 for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00185                     shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry = dynamic_pointer_cast<XScalarEntry>(*it);
00186                     if(!*entry->store()) continue;
00187                     shared_ptr<XDriver> d(entry->driver());
00188                     if(!d) continue;
00189                     locked_entries.push_back(entry);
00190                     d->readLockRecord();
00191                     if(entry->isTriggered()) triggered_time = entry->driver()->time();
00192                 }
00193             }
00194             if(triggered_time) {
00195                 XRecordDependency dep;
00196                 for(std::deque<shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> >::iterator it = locked_entries.begin();
00197                     it != locked_entries.end(); it++) {
00198                     shared_ptr<XDriver> d((*it)->driver());
00199                     if(!d) continue;
00200                     dep.merge(d);
00201                     if(dep.isConflict()) break;
00202                 }
00203                 if(!dep.isConflict()) {
00204                     std::string buf;
00205                     for(std::deque<shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> >::iterator it = locked_entries.begin();
00206                         it != locked_entries.end(); it++) {
00207                         if(!*(*it)->store()) continue;
00208                         (*it)->storeValue();
00209                         buf.append((*it)->storedValue()->to_str() + " ");
00210                     }
00211                     buf.append(driver->time().getTimeFmtStr("%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S"));
00212                     lastLine()->value(buf);
00213                 }
00214             }
00215             for(std::deque<shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> >::iterator it = locked_entries.begin();
00216                 it != locked_entries.end(); it++) {
00217                 shared_ptr<XDriver> d((*it)->driver());
00218                 if(!d) continue;
00219                 d->readUnlockRecord();
00220             }
00221         }
00222     }
00223 }
00224 
00225 void
00226 XTextWriter::onFilenameChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00227 {
00228     XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_filemutex);  
00229     if(m_stream.is_open()) m_stream.close();
00230     m_stream.clear();
00231     m_stream.open((const char*)QString(filename()->to_str()).local8Bit(), OFSMODE);
00232 
00233     if(m_stream.good()) {
00234         m_lsnOnFlush = recording()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00235             shared_from_this(), &XTextWriter::onFlush);
00236         m_lsnOnLastLineChanged = lastLine()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00237             shared_from_this(), &XTextWriter::onLastLineChanged);
00238         lastLine()->setUIEnabled(true);
00239 
00240         std::string buf;
00241         buf = "#";
00242         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_entries->children());
00243         if(list) { 
00244             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++) {
00245                 shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> entry = dynamic_pointer_cast<XScalarEntry>(*it);
00246                 if(!*entry->store()) continue;
00247                 buf.append(entry->getLabel());
00248                 buf.append(" ");
00249             }
00250         }
00251         buf.append("Time");
00252         lastLine()->value(buf);
00253     }
00254     else {
00255         m_lsnOnFlush.reset();
00256         m_lsnOnLastLineChanged.reset();
00257         lastLine()->setUIEnabled(false);
00258     }
00259 }
00260 void
00261 XTextWriter::onFlush(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00262 {
00263     lastLine()->setUIEnabled(*recording());
00264     if(!*recording()) {
00265         XScopedLock<XRecursiveMutex> lock(m_filemutex);  
00266         if(m_stream.good())
00267             m_stream.flush();
00268     }
00269 }
